Administration
==============

**About Us**
------------

The Administration Department is responsible for overseeing the management of the town's day to day operations.  The Department is comprised of the Town Administrator, Town Secretary, and Town Treasurer/Financial Analyst.  The department provides support to the Mayor and Town Council and implements the Council Vision and priorities

![Town Administrator Chris Laugenour wearing a gray suit, red shirt, and plaid tie, smiling and standing against a plain beige wall.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/682152fec643c844598dff3f/0aeeafba-12c1-4c9c-811a-ff00fa8eb8f3/AAACFF2A-E2C4-4ECF-9EE5-60DD44DCB5D8.jpeg)

Chris Laugenour  
**Town Administrator**  
*Chris.Laugenour@doubleoak.texas.gov*

Meet the Town Administrator
---------------------------

Chris Laugenour serves as the Town Administrator for Double Oak, drawing on decades of public service across California and Texas. His leadership has shaped community-driven projects from public transit restructuring to landmark facility upgrades. With his collaborative approach and dedication to local values, Chris supports the town's long-term vision through thoughtful planning and citizen engagement. He holds a Master of Public Administration.

**Staff Contacts**
------------------

| Laura Meilinger | Town Treasurer / Financial Analyst | (972) 539-9464 |

**\* FAX:** (972) 539-9613
